translations: 再搅拌（remix 的第三人称单数）
混音版音乐（remix 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Their new album features remixes of some of their previous hits.
sentences.translation: 新专辑主要收录了一些他们曾风靡一时的老歌的混音版本。

sentences.sentence: There are live tracks, B-sides, remixes, even (gasp) covers.
sentences.translation: 这里有现场录音，单曲，混编曲目，甚至是唱片的封套。

sentences.sentence: In music unofficial remixes can boost sales of the original work.
sentences.translation: 在音乐行业，非官方的混音版也能促进原版销售。
